name: Bad Space Game
description:
Arrow to move | R to restart | Z to shoot

if you get a health (that red cube), you'll get 1 HP but your enemy would get 2 HP and the block wont disapear after you touch it.

After 10 bullet you had to reload, so does your enemy.

here a challenge, beat it under 30 sec. to easy ? fine, my high score is 16.09 sec, try to beat that sucker XD

just my personal experiment to create an "AI"

Submission for trijam #75, made in 3 hours and 10 minutes. the idea is made a game where each time you get a power up, your enemy got twice the benefit. but 10 min left on the clock and no power up has been implemented yet, so i only able to made 1 power up
